New copies of the form can be duplicated from a master copy.
to repeat something in exactly the same way
We don’t want staff to duplicate each other’s work.
exactly the same as something, or made as an exact copy of something
A duplicate copy should be made for the county record office.
an exact copy of something that you can use in the same way
She kept both the duplicate and the original.
Locksmiths can make duplicates of most keys.
an exact copy of a document
Did you keep a duplicate of the contract?
if a document is written in duplicate, there are two copies of it
Provide a separate invoice in duplicate for each purchase order.
to repeat, perhaps unnecessarily, something that has already been done
Duplicating research is costly and time-consuming.
The report merely duplicates earlier findings.
